seed_pair.target: Si hubiera sabido habría hecho las cosas de manera diferente.
seed_pair.known: If I'd known I'd have done things differently.

S0597: Sospecho que ha oído cien historias sobre ello.
I suspect that he's heard a hundred stories about it.
S0598: Ha oído mil historias sobre lo que estaban haciendo.
He's heard a thousand stories about what they were doing.
S0599: Habría estado feliz de conducir si me lo hubieras dicho.
I'd have been happy to drive if you'd told me.
S0600: Habría conducido si me hubieras dicho lo cansado que estabas.
I'd have driven if you'd told me how tired you were.
S0601: Estábamos hablando sobre cómo empezó todo.
We were talking about how it all started.
S0602: How it started in the first place.
S0603: No teníamos ningún lugar donde vivir en ese momento.
We didn't have anywhere to live at the time.
S0604: Ella se ofreció a dejarnos quedarnos con ella.
She offered to let us stay with her.
S0606: Si hubiera sabido entonces lo que sé ahora habría esperado.
If I'd known then what I know now I'd have waited.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
